recordings.requestBody: {"documents":[{"id":"0","text":"I had a wonderful trip to Seattle last week and even visited the Space Needle 2 times!","language":"en"},{"id":"1","text":"","language":"en"},{"id":"2","text":"Unfortunately, it rained during my entire trip to Seattle. I didn't even get to visit the Space Needle","language":"en"},{"id":"3","text":"I went to see a movie on Saturday and it was perfectly average, nothing more or less than I expected.","language":"en"},{"id":"4","text":"I didn't like the last book I read at all.","language":"en"}]}
